name: The Last Tree (itch) (itsBEN2112)
description:
Player 1:
F to interact
WASD: movement
Space: Jump

Player 2:( Mouse player )
Mouse (movement)
Left Click : Place mushroom on soil
Left Click Drag: Draw Vine
Right Click: on soil, will delete spawned mushroom or vine


The world was once a lush, breathtakingly beautiful entity. Full of life. Full of prosperity.

Until the mortals allowed their greed and corruption to taint the lands. Thick forests became barren. The water, once fresh, now polluted slush. The birds no longer sing. The air is now clouded in smog. 

In a last attempt to save what is left of the world. There is a secret to be revealed; a secret to protect. A sense of hope to keep. 

The last living seed.

The life to return to the dead lands.

I am the protector of the seed.

I am the spirit of the forest.

I am hope.
